name: Blob (itch) (Elisabetta)
description:
Oh no! A scientist during an experiment has become a blob. Help him in the various levels to find the potion that will make him human again.

Change your state from solid, gas, electric, or shrink to open doors to various laboratories. Good luck!

This is a group project, made by 3 people in 2 weeks, we would like to get some feedback :)
